trans-unit.source: Specifies the class used to implement design-time services for a component.
trans-unit.target: 指定用來實作元件之設計階段服務的類別。

trans-unit.source: The class you use for the design-time services must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您用於設計階段服務類別必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>介面。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute.DesignerBaseTypeName%2A> property to find the designer's base type.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute.DesignerBaseTypeName%2A>找不到設計工具的基底類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute.DesignerTypeName%2A> property to get the name of the type of designer associated with this member.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute.DesignerTypeName%2A>屬性來取得與此成員相關聯的設計工具的型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a class called `MyForm`.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立一種類別稱為`MyForm`。

trans-unit.source: `MyForm` has two attributes, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> that specifies this class uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>, and a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute> that specifies the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute.Form> category.
trans-unit.target: `MyForm` 具有兩個屬性， <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> ，指定這個類別會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.DocumentDesigner>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute>指定<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerCategoryAttribute.Form>類別目錄。

trans-unit.source: The next example creates an instance of `MyForm`.
trans-unit.target: 下一個範例中建立的執行個體`MyForm`。

trans-unit.source: Then it gets the attributes for the class, extracts the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>, and prints the name of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 然後它取得的屬性類別，擷取<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>，並列印設計工具的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The concatenation of the fully qualified name of the type that provides design-time services for the component this attribute is bound to, and the name of the assembly this type resides in.
trans-unit.target: 針對這個屬性所繫結至之元件提供設計階段服務的型別，其完整名稱的串連，以及這個型別所在的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> class using the name of the type that provides design-time services.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供設計階段服務的型別名稱來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The class you use for the design-time services must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您用於設計階段服務類別必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>介面。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the class that provides design-time services for the component this attribute is bound to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示為與這個屬性繫結的元件提供設計階段服務的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> class using the type that provides design-time services.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供設計階段服務的型別來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The class you use for the design-time services must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您用於設計階段服務類別必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>介面。

trans-unit.source: The concatenation of the fully qualified name of the type that provides design-time services for the component this attribute is bound to, and the name of the assembly this type resides in.
trans-unit.target: 針對這個屬性所繫結至之元件提供設計階段服務的型別，其完整名稱的串連，以及這個型別所在的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the base class to associate with the designer class.
trans-unit.target: 與設計工具類別相關的基底類別的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> class using the designer type and the base class for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用設計工具型別和設計工具的基底類別 (Base Class) 來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The class you use for the design-time services must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您用於設計階段服務類別必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>介面。

trans-unit.source: The `designerBaseTypeName` parameter allows you to attach more than one type of designer for a given class.
trans-unit.target: `designerBaseTypeName`參數可讓您將多個指定之類別的設計工具型別。

trans-unit.source: The concatenation of the fully qualified name of the type that provides design-time services for the component this attribute is bound to, and the name of the assembly this type resides in.
trans-unit.target: 針對這個屬性所繫結至之元件提供設計階段服務的型別，其完整名稱的串連，以及這個型別所在的組件名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the base class to associate with the <c>designerTypeName</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示與 <c>designerTypeName</c> 建立關聯的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> class, using the name of the designer class and the base class for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 使用設計工具類別的名稱和設計工具的基底類別來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The class you use for the design-time services must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您用於設計階段服務類別必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>介面。

trans-unit.source: The `designerBaseType` parameter allows you to attach more than one type of designer for a given class.
trans-unit.target: `designerBaseType`參數可讓您將多個指定之類別的設計工具型別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the class that provides design-time services for the component this attribute is bound to.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示為與這個屬性繫結的元件提供設計階段服務的類別。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the base class to associate with the <c>designerType</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示與 <c>designerType</c> 建立關聯的基底類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> class using the types of the designer and designer base class.
trans-unit.target: 使用設計工具的型別和設計工具基底類別來初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The class you use for the design-time services must implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: 您用於設計階段服務類別必須實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner>介面。

trans-unit.source: The `designerBaseType` parameter allows you to attach more than one type of designer for a given class.
trans-unit.target: `designerBaseType`參數可讓您將多個指定之類別的設計工具型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the base type of this designer.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個設計工具的基底型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the base type of this designer.
trans-unit.target: 這個設計工具的基底型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the designer type associated with this designer attribute.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個設計工具屬性相關的設計工具型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the designer type associated with this designer attribute.
trans-unit.target: 與這個設計工具屬性相關的設計工具型別名稱。

trans-unit.source: The object to test the value equality of.
trans-unit.target: 測試其數值相等的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，表示指定的物件值是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件值等於目前的值，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique ID for this attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 取得此屬性型別的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: A unique ID for this attribute type.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性型別的唯一 ID。

trans-unit.source: It is used by filtering algorithms to identify two attributes that are the same type.
trans-unit.target: 它可由篩選演算法來識別兩個相同類型的屬性。

trans-unit.source: For most attributes, this just returns the <xref:System.Type> instance for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 對於大部分的屬性，這只會傳回<xref:System.Type>屬性的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> overrides this to include the type of the designer base type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> 覆寫以包含設計工具的基底類型的類型。
